availability of supervised training data.from sentence: Secondly , we markedly improve the availability of supervised training data by using Mechanical Turk crowd annotation to produce a large supervised training dataset , suitable for the common relations between people , organizations and locations which are used in the TAC KBP evaluations .

TAC Relation Extraction Dataset ( TACRED.from sentence: We name this dataset the TAC Relation Extraction Dataset ( TACRED ) , and will make it available through the Linguistic Data Consortium ( LDC ) in order to respect copyrights on the underlying text .
